page.title: 18Education in Craigie.
page.content: There are{three hundred and forty six children at Craigie Primary School and {thirteen}class{teachers. Visiting teachers per week include{Music, Art and{Gym.-}one day each. A{Needlework teacher comes once a fortnight. The most recent subject being taught is{computer}which{all stages}use from Primary 1 onwards. The school has two B.B.C. Basic Microcomputers, two Disk Drives and a Printer. Each class is allocated a four hour block per week and the children thoroughly enjoy this work. Craigie has done well in the past in the realm of{sport}but this year due to{industrial action}by Secondary and Primary{teachers}over remuneration and conditions, teaching staff have opted out of extra-mural activities. There are{no}plans for{football, netball}or {badminton}this year.
